name: Invitation Suite Deposit
description:
So you've decided to include Modern Museum Paper Co. in your big day?  Great!!  We love a good party.

To begin the design process, choose your invitation suite below and purchase this deposit listing.  This deposit is non-refundable, but 100% is counted toward your final order total.  We'll be in touch within 48 hours to begin gathering your wording and any other special requests, such as color or typeface.  

We'll customize your suite and send over up to eight rounds of digital proofs for your approval.  (Beginning with the ninth, extra charges may apply.)  Once you've given your final "okay", we're ready to go to press!  We'll set up a custom listing for you for the remaining balance of your order (less the deposit), and once it has been purchased your order ships within 15 days.

options.name: Say it With Roses invitation suite

name: Marital Bliss invitation suite
description:
It's a sign of things to come. Who says it can't be a bed of roses? This set is elegant and glamorous while still subtle and understated. Just like the two of you.  It's also available in any color scheme you can imagine, just like every other Modern Museum set.

Set includes:
A7 invitation card and envelope
A6 rsvp card and envelope


Ready to get started?  Great!  Purchase the deposit listing (see categories in the upper right-hand corner of your screen) and we'll be in touch to begin work within 48 hours.   

Want to get a closer look before committing? We don't blame you!  Simply purchase this listing and we'll send a sample your way!

name: Charmed invitation suite
description:
Modern, sweet, and - of course! - charming: this set is for the blushing bride who wants to add a lighthearted and whimsical touch to the day.  It's also available in any color scheme you can imagine, just like every other Modern Museum set.

Set includes:
A7 invitation card and envelope
A6 rsvp postcard


Ready to get started?  Great!  Purchase the deposit listing (see categories in the upper right-hand corner of your screen) and we'll be in touch to begin work within 48 hours.   

Want to get a closer look before committing? We don't blame you!  Simply purchase this listing and we'll send a sample your way!

name: Palm Springs invitation suite
description:
Warm baked browns and nudes. Sun-kissed pinks and golds. Late-summer city-evening Pacific-coast cool!  Available in any color combination.  

A6 set includes: 
invitation and envelope
rsvp postcard
reception information card
belly band with name closure

Ready to get started? Great! Purchase the deposit listing (see categories in the upper right-hand corner of your screen) and we'll be in touch to begin work within 48 hours.

Want to get a closer look before committing? We don't blame you! Simply purchase this listing and we'll send a sample your way!
